metadata.title: CVE-2012-6707 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: WordPress through 4.8.2 uses a weak MD5-based password hashing algorithm,which makes it easier for attackers to determine cleartext values byleveraging access to the hash values. NOTE: the approach to changing thismay not be fully compatible with certain use cases, such as migration of aWordPress site from a web host that uses a recent PHP version to adifferent web host that uses PHP 5.2. These use cases are plausible (butvery unlikely) based on statistics showing widespread deployment ofWordPress with obsolete PHP versions.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
